last_episode_to_air.name: Montana 6 Man
last_episode_to_air.overview: As farms dry up in Montana and people disappear, two schools that were once bitter rivals must join forces to give hope to two fading towns.

name: Vice World of Sports
overview: Get on the field and into the ring through a series of compelling stories at the fringe of culture and politics, across a range of places and people through the one lens that connects them all: sport.

episodes.name: Boys of Bukom
episodes.overview: The real Mecca of boxing isn't Vegas. It's a slum village on the coast of Ghana.

episodes.name: The Eternal Derby
episodes.overview: In Serbia, one violent game has endured communism and civil war. The Eternal Derby.

episodes.name: Bayou Classic
episodes.overview: At the Louisiana rivalry known as "The Black Superbowl", gametime is at the half.

episodes.name: Las Grandes Ligas
episodes.overview: As Cuba and America embark on a seismic shift, Cuban ballplayers are caught in the middle: forced to wait on diplomacy or risk their lives for their chance at the Majors.

episodes.name: The Luzira Upper Prison
episodes.overview: Overcrowded and underfunded, Luzira is home to Uganda's only maximum-security prison--but also an elaborate soccer league.

episodes.name: The Perfect Sheet
episodes.overview: Hockey's "Gibson Cup" is as old as the sport itself, and in a quiet Michigan town where the game was first born, two teams have been battling for it for over 100 years.

episodes.name: Jake & Zane
episodes.overview: The tiny village of Iten, Kenya is home to the fastest runners in the world, more record-holders than anywhere elseâ€¦and a pair of testy twins from New Zealand.

episodes.name: The Line
episodes.overview: Amidst scandals, legislative battles and the new frontier of daily fantasy, the biggest debate in the world of sports today is gambling. Is it legal? And how do you define it?

episodes.name: Seven Generations
episodes.overview: Across a history of oppression, through years of federal neglect and in the midst of a cultural awakening, one sport has endured on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation: basketball.

episodes.name: The Boom Squad
episodes.overview: Miami's Liberty City is football's Mecca, home to NFL legends. But the biggest rivalry in this city isn't exactly big--it all starts with a hard-hitting squad of 6 year-olds.

episodes.name: Superclasico
episodes.overview: Boca and River may be the most infamous rivals in the world of soccer, but today, Argentina's most legendary game is known less for the battle on the field than the anarchy off it.

episodes.name: Calcio Storico
episodes.overview: On most days Florence is overrun by tourists, but once each year, the locals reclaim their city through an ancient game where the roots run deep and the blood flows freely.

episodes.name: Aussie Rules
episodes.overview: Biggest rivalry in Australian football is marked by broken jaws, foul mouths and phallic tattoos.

episodes.name: Aphromoo vs Doublelift
episodes.overview: The story of teammate-turned-enemy in the world of E-sports.

episodes.name: The Mercer Cup
episodes.overview: Buried deep in the Appalachian hills, an old grudge between two fading towns lives on through a basketball rivalry at the lowest level of the minor leagues.

episodes.name: Derby Beirut
episodes.overview: In a nation defined by religious and political rivalry, the game between Lebanon's two best basketball clubs is no exception.

episodes.name: Battle of Algiers
episodes.overview: Algeria is home to North Africa's biggest soccer derby; this all-consuming rivalry is rooted not in hate, but the same love for the game that forged their country through revolution.

episodes.name: Montana 6 Man
episodes.overview: As farms dry up in Montana and people disappear, two schools that were once bitter rivals must join forces to give hope to two fading towns.
